an6.41:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma sariputto rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
an6.41:1.3: Atha kho ayasma sariputto pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim gijjhakuta pabbata orohanto addasa annatarasmim padese mahantam darukkhandham.
an6.41:1.5: “passatha no, avuso, tumhe amum mahantam darukkhandhan”ti?
an6.41:2.1: “Akankhamano, avuso, bhikkhu iddhima cetovasippatto amum darukkhandham pathavitveva adhimucceyya.
an6.41:2.3: Atthi, avuso, amumhi darukkhandhe pathavidhatu, yam nissaya bhikkhu iddhima cetovasippatto amum darukkhandham pathavitveva adhimucceyya.
an6.41:2.4: Akankhamano, avuso, bhikkhu iddhima cetovasippatto amum darukkhandham apotveva adhimucceyya …pe…
an6.41:2.10: Atthi, avuso, amumhi darukkhandhe asubhadhatu, yam nissaya bhikkhu iddhima cetovasippatto amum darukkhandham asubhantveva adhimucceyya”ti.
